description:
The course explores an aspect of 20th-century American literature intensively; specific course topics will vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS 20TH-C AMERICAN LIT: Art in a Time of Crisis:  the Literature of the Great Depression
